product_data_model.description: The unique identifier for a product, usually its name or label.
product_data_model.name: title

product_data_model.description: The name of the company or entity that produces the product.
product_data_model.name: manufacturer

product_data_model.description: A detailed description of the product, which provides potential buyers with insights into the product's features, use, and origin.
product_data_model.name: description

product_data_model.description: A brief introduction or promotional text about the product.
product_data_model.name: intro

product_data_model.description: Information about the price per unit, including any applicable tax and delivery cost information.
product_data_model.name: price_unit

product_data_model.description: Background story of the producer, detailing history, practices, and other relevant details.
product_data_model.name: producer_story

product_data_model.description: The geographic elevation where the coffee is grown, typically stated in meters above sea level.
product_data_model.name: properties_height

product_data_model.description: The name of the person or organization that produces the coffee.
product_data_model.name: properties_producer

product_data_model.description: The method used to process the coffee beans, such as Natural or Washed.
product_data_model.name: properties_process

product_data_model.description: The geographic origin of the coffee, including country and possibly region.
product_data_model.name: properties_origin

product_data_model.description: The coffee variety or cultivar, describing the specific type of coffee plant used.
product_data_model.name: properties_variety

product_data_model.description: Attributes describing the flavor profile of the coffee as experienced during tasting.
product_data_model.name: taste_profile

product_data_model.description: Standard unit price including reference to standard weight and additional cost details.
product_data_model.name: price_unit_reference

product_data_model.description: Details on the inclusion of taxes in the product pricing.
product_data_model.name: price_includes_tax

product_data_model.description: Expected delivery time for the product from order placement to delivery.
product_data_model.name: delivery_time

product_data_model.description: The growing altitude of the coffee beans.
product_data_model.name: altitude

product_data_model.description: Information about the producers of the coffee, often encompassing multiple types of producers or collaborative efforts.
product_data_model.name: producers

product_data_model.description: The method of processing the coffee, indicating washing and fermentation techniques.
product_data_model.name: process

product_data_model.description: The source region of the product, typically specifying country and region.
product_data_model.name: origin

product_data_model.description: Denoting the specific coffee variety, indicating genetic type and characteristic qualities.
product_data_model.name: variety

product_data_model.description: Specific flavor notes that can be detected in the coffee's flavor profile.
product_data_model.name: taste_notes

product_data_model.description: An expanded overview or deeper insight into the product specifics, features, and benefits.
product_data_model.name: detailed_description

product_data_model.description: In-depth information about the producer, possibly including history, ethos, and farming practices.
product_data_model.name: producer_information

product_data_model.description: A descriptive promotional introduction to the product highlighting unique features or selling points.
product_data_model.name: intro_description

product_data_model.description: The base price of the product excluding some additional costs or aftermarket charges.
product_data_model.name: base_price

product_data_model.description: Information related to tax billed on product pricing.
product_data_model.name: tax_info

product_data_model.description: Detailed attributes and characteristics of the product usually including growth and processing conditions.
product_data_model.name: properties

product_data_model.description: Flavor descriptors associated with taste experience such as fruity or nutty notes.
product_data_model.name: taste

product_data_model.description: A comprehensive description focusing on unique product attributes or cultural significance.
product_data_model.name: product_detail_description

product_data_model.description: Supplementary details that enrich the product story or specifications.
product_data_model.name: additional_description

product_data_model.description: Further elaboration on the producer portfolio, emphasizing unique selling propositions.
product_data_model.name: producer_details

product_data_model.description: Background or additional information about the producer or farming practices.
product_data_model.name: producer_info

product_data_model.description: Breakdown of the product price with considerations for unit cost and additional expenses.
product_data_model.name: price_info

product_data_model.description: Short introductory description providing the initial product insight or appeal elements.
product_data_model.name: description_intro

product_data_model.description: Information regarding delivery expectations including time, method, and service provider.
product_data_model.name: delivery_info

product_data_model.description: Defined specifications or qualities of the product specifying features or components.
product_data_model.name: attributes

product_data_model.description: Contextual background story providing insights into product development or historical essence.
product_data_model.name: The Story Behind

product_data_model.description: Extended narrative providing comprehensive understanding or storytelling about the product's journey or utilization.
product_data_model.name: long_description

product_data_model.description: Seller or producer's message to the consumers, potentially inviting engagement or learning more about their craft.
product_data_model.name: meet_the_producer

product_data_model.description: Type specifying variety in context to the product, often relating to origin-based qualities.
product_data_model.name: varietal
